content: We have multiple BINS as well as AVS addresses for USA cards. No minimum order amounts. Order 1 card or 100. Contact me for more details.Basic verification cards $0.50$1 balance: $2$2 balance: $3Re-loadable: $10 issuing fee + the higher of 4% or $2 per top up.  European Union BINS Available:474366 (Spain)USA BINS Available:54629147569952249 (can assign with any AVS zip code or name, best for online shopping and subscriptions)South America:485953 (Colombia)All cards have a 3 to 5 year exp date and have been tested on GCP, Google Ads, Bing Ads, Taboola, Azure, AWS, Oracle Cloud, Paypal, Ebay, Etsy, Apple, Spotify, Digital Ocean, Sendgrid, ScalewayWe accept BTC/LTC/USDT/USDC as well as credit/debit card payments.https://t.me/Vcardsint
